alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 11:26PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Webb County through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1126 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mirando City, or 20 miles west of Hebbronville, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mirando City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for south central Texas.
